name: Psycho Fox
description: You're Psycho Fox, an extraordinary fox that goes out to save the world from the wicked Madfox Daimyojin. He's the powerful, evil fox that sends out all sorts of bizarre creatures to conquer the world. Watch out for those trick stairways and disappearing bridges! The Madfox has completely changed the landscape - just to give you a hard time! Sounds like a tough trek? Don't give up yet! You have the power to transform into other animals to help you get through certain obstacles. Remember, you're not an average fox, you're Psycho Fox!
